data.title: North Valley Baptist Church

About the Broadcast

Dr. Jack Trieber, Pastor of North Valley Baptist Church and President of Golden State Baptist College, will be coming to you every weekday with a special time of revival and enthusiasm that will lift your spirit and encourage your walk with God.

We hope you will join us every weekday, and allow us to bring a piece of revival into your daily life. We would love to hear from you.

Contact Us

3530 De La Cruz Blvd.

Santa Clara, CA 95054

408.988.8881

Email Revival Time
